    Hi there!

    I am currently a Msc student of Bioinformatics at COMSATS University Islamabad . I am working as a Research Assisant under the supervision of Dr. Muddassar Muhammad at Drug DIscovery and Omic lab

    Research interest: Machine learning, Next-generation sequence,Cancer Informatics, Proteomics, MultiOmics Analysis.
